title: Psychotic
description: ELLIEThey lied to me. Kept secrets.And now, I'm forced to pay the ultimate price.The Divine One sees me as a necessary sacrifice in this war I know very little about.Do I allow myself to become a pawn...or do I fight back with everything I have, regardless of the consequences?THE KINGSThe girl we adore and love is in the hands of our greatest enemy.The cult that haunts the halls of Grove Academy wants to use our Ellie for nefarious purposes. We might be too late to stop them.And even if we do find a way to save Ellie...will she ever forgive us? Or is our story destined to end in tears and bloodshed?
author: Katie May
